name: Premiumpress Documentation
body:
### Welcome to PremiumPress Doc Pages.
Just an entry point to the official & unofficial PP documentation:

* [PremiumPress Documentation](http://www.premiumpress.com/documentation/)
* [**Getting Started Tutorials and User Guides**](http://www.premiumpress.com/gettingstarted/)

### Getting Everything Setup
[Themes SETUP step-by-step](http://www.premiumpress.com/_v8/docs/1/)

### Updates of the Updates
* [All about Upgrading Your PremiumPress Theme] (http://s.premiumpress.com/index.php?/Knowledgebase/Article/View/4/0/upgrading-your-premiumpress-theme)
* [Another Update?](http://www.premiumpress.com/updates/)

### DEVELOPMENT: Developers' Guides
* [Hooks and Filters - Complete List](http://www.premiumpress.com/_v8/docs/2/)
* [Creating Plugins](http://www.premiumpress.com/_v8/docs/3/)
* [Creating PremiumPress Child Themes](http://www.premiumpress.com/_v8/docs/4/)
* [Theme Shortcodes](http://www.premiumpress.com/_v8/docs/5/)

## Authors and Contributors
You are all welcome to add new entries to this list :)

[Support and Live Chat](http://s.premiumpress.com/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
